ja490:8.1: uragā dujivha → uraga dvijivha (bj) | uraga dujivha (sya1ed, sya2ed) | uragaddujivha (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja490:10.2: Kanditvā roditvā → kanditvā roditva (bj) | kanditva roditva (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja490:16.2: Atricchatā → atricchatāya (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), mallagāmaṃ → malataṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | mallayataṃ (mr)
ja490:20.1: Evampahaṃ vandi na → evampahaṃ naggahe (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | evampihaṃ vandi na (sya1ed, sya2ed)
